content: **knitted mittens in drops karisma the piece is worked in a nordic pattern theme christmas ** drops design pattern no u-875 yarn group b size one-size **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g color 21 medium grey 50 g color 01 off white **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height in stockinette stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm = us 2 5 the needle size is only a guide if you have too many stitches in 10 cm = 4 change to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches in 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller needle size
